Malice:
 
Malice put his arms around the femme, and hugged her back.  He thought about saying something, but it didn't seem like the time.
"Master..." he said in a low voice.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

BlackNightmare huged him  and didn't say anything.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> The male got off the bed and walked over to Blacknightmare.
> "Is there something wrong?  I'm sorry for whatever I might have 
done."
> He took her hand in his and gave it a gentle squeeze.
> "I am sorry, Master."
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare::
> 
> The femme didn't know what belive, and didn't move or say 
nothing... 
> Storm among her didn't let her think cleary

> >

> > "Everything looks good now." she said, getting up.  She pulled 
the

> in their places.  She walked toward the door and was about to step 
> out.
> > "See you later." she said, winking at Malice.
> >

> sweat dropped at the wink from Hellplague, he thought she was 
trying 
> to cause trouble.  He looked up to Blacknightmare, a little 
nervious.
> > "That a few seconds ago, it was all her.  She came onto me, I 
had

> >

up,
